meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Julia Kozicki Rich Beimer Bhibha Das Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6262.

td.p: Julia Kozicki, an attorney from Noblesville, Indiana
Rich Beimer, a writer and actor from Clarksville, Tennessee
Bhibha Das, a postdoctoral research associate originally from Mt. Zion, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $41,380)

tr.td: YOUR HISTORICAL INSURANCE ADJUSTER
FOOD TALK
FINANCE WITH DAVID FABER
(Alex: The CNBC personality.)
5-LETTER WORDS
MY MOVIES
THE STORY OF O

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'A 1906 natural disaster in this city saw its $7 mil. city hall crumble but that\'s not my fault! Get it?! Insurance humor!')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: A 1906 natural disaster in this city saw its $7 mil. city hall crumble but that's not my fault! Get it?! Insurance humor!

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', '(David Faber gives the clue from the set of The Faber Report.) The large, deferred payment due at the end of a type of low-interest mortgage loan is known as this "inflatable" term')

tr.td: (David Faber gives the clue from the set of The Faber Report.) The large, deferred payment due at the end of a type of low-interest mortgage loan is known as this "inflatable" term

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_5_4', 'clue_J_5_4_stuck', '(Rich: What is ooo, Mother?)
[Alex and audience chuckle at Rich\'s delivery]
(Alex: [to Rich]: You\'re sort of on the right track, but--oh, Bhibha?)
(Bhibha: What is my Sister?)
(Alex: Correct response is My [*] is an Alien. If you\'re gonna pick on somebody, you don\'t pick on mom. You pick on your stepmom.)

Stepmother

BhibhaRich
Triple Stumper
')

Rich
Julia

Rich
Julia
HATS ENTERTAINMENT
NUMERIC PLACES
"HAB" A CLUE
HONORING WHAT?
HUD SECRETARIES
THE STORY OF O. HENRY

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Bhibha
Rich
Julia

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
BhibhaWhat is the Washington Monument?
$0
RichWhat is the Empire State Building?
$8,200
JuliaWhat is the Washington Monument?
$12,401
the Washington Monument')

Julia

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
